price: Rabbiin ni jedha,“Ana biratti wal hin falminaa, Ani dursee sodaachisa kiyya gara keessanitti ergeera.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhtaṣimū ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil-waʿīdi
